mapper.sql: select id, order_date, order_time, start, end, car_type, car_no, custmer_id, custmer_name, phone_num, payment_term, towing_fee, towcar_no, commission, za_fee, approve_status, driver_name, user_id, company_pay, return_money, refuel_money, refuelcard_money, mileage, remark, app_remark, update_time,return_amount,record_money,componyreceiver_money,driverreceiver_money from order_manager
mapper.select: select count(*) from order_manager where custmer_id = #{custmerId}
SELECT t.refuel_money + t.refuelcard_money AS refuelMoney FROM order_manager t GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.order_date,'%c') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(t.order_date,'%c') ASC
SELECT t.return_money AS returnMoney FROM order_manager t WHERE t.approve_status = 2 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.order_date,'%c') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(t.order_date,'%c') ASC
SELECT t.commission AS commission FROM order_manager t WHERE t.approve_status = 2 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.order_date,'%c') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(t.order_date,'%c') ASC

SELECT t.towing_fee-t.refuel_money-t.refuelcard_money-t.commission AS commission FROM order_manager t WHERE t.approve_status = 2 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.order_date,'%c') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(t.order_date,'%c') ASC

choose.when: select id,custmerName,phoneNum,towingFee,recordMoney,returnAmount,arrearMoney,remark from ( SELECT m.id, m.custmer_name AS custmerName, m.phone_num AS phoneNum, SUM(t.towing_fee) AS towingFee, SUM(t.record_money) AS recordMoney, SUM(t.return_amount) AS returnAmount, CASE WHEN ( SUM(t.record_money) - SUM(t.return_amount) ) > 0 THEN ( SUM(t.record_money) - SUM(t.return_amount) ) ELSE 0 END arrearMoney, m.remark FROM custmer m LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.custmer_id,b.towing_fee,b.record_money,b.return_amount FROM order_manager b WHERE b.approve_status = 2 ) t ON m.id = t.custmer_id GROUP BY m.id ) p where p.arrearMoney !=0

select id,custmerName,phoneNum,towingFee,recordMoney,returnAmount,arrearMoney,remark from ( SELECT m.id, m.custmer_name AS custmerName, m.phone_num AS phoneNum, SUM(t.towing_fee) AS towingFee, SUM(t.record_money) AS recordMoney, SUM(t.return_amount) AS returnAmount, CASE WHEN ( SUM(t.record_money) - SUM(t.return_amount) ) > 0 THEN ( SUM(t.record_money) - SUM(t.return_amount) ) ELSE 0 END arrearMoney, m.remark FROM custmer m LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.custmer_id,b.towing_fee,b.record_money,b.return_amount FROM order_manager b WHERE b.approve_status = 2 ) t ON m.id = t.custmer_id GROUP BY m.id ) p where p.arrearMoney = 0
choose.otherwise: SELECT m.id, m.custmer_name AS custmerName, m.phone_num AS phoneNum, SUM(t.towing_fee) AS towingFee, SUM(t.record_money) AS recordMoney, SUM(t.return_amount) AS returnAmount, CASE WHEN ( SUM(t.record_money) - SUM(t.return_amount) ) > 0 THEN ( SUM(t.record_money) - SUM(t.return_amount) ) ELSE 0 END arrearMoney, m.remark FROM custmer m LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.custmer_id,b.towing_fee,b.record_money,b.return_amount FROM order_manager b WHERE b.approve_status = 2 ) t ON m.id = t.custmer_id GROUP BY m.id
